reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: Having recently purchased a new house, I have been making some updates and wanted to replace the standard light switches with paddle switches. With a three switch staircase setup, I was looking for a 4-way switch, I was given the chance to try this one from ThunderWay. At first appearance, these switches look great. Installing was super easy and I found that they controlled the lights perfectly. They respond quickly turning on and off and the switch is very smooth with a definitive click into place when turning on and off. My only small criticism, as demonstrated in my video, is that the switch doesn't sit flush on the bottom. There is a little wiggle room that I have not had with other switches that I have installed in my house. It is a very small thing and not something that people would generally notice but it is something that should be improved. (Note: the crooked seating in the video is not due to the switch but rather the electrical box). All-in-all, I think this is a great option if you are in need of a double pole / 4-way switch, especially given the fact you are given 2 switches for under $20. I will probably replace the face plate with a more stylish, screwless option. But for the price and with its functionality, this is a great option.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2024
reviews.title: Easy to install, switches work perfectly, very good option for double pole setups

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: This is a great set of decorator switches for use in a 3 or 4 way lighting situation. They are made with heavy duty plastic and the back terminals are very easy to use to put your wires into. I would definitely buy these again in the future.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2024
reviews.title: Great set of decorator switches

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: A 2-way switch connects or disconnects between two terminals. A 3-way switch connects the common terminal to either one of the terminals. A 4-way switch connects or disconnects two pairs of terminals. 4-way switch is needed if more than two switches control one light: two switches should be 3-way and all additional ones should be 4-way. Good switches test no continuity between terminals when disconnected and almost 0 ohms when connected. The 4-way switches looks like good quality upon physical examination. They test perfect functionally, as expected. Overall price is reasonable for two switches with cover plates.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2024
reviews.title: Good quality 4-way switch

The drive is not standard Phillips head but appears to be square which means you wonâ€™t be able to tighten it properly. Overall this is a fire hazard and Amazon should discontinue sales before someone gets hurt or starts a fire.

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: remodelling the basement and getting rid of the old bakelite switches + the sketchy knob and tube wiring that powered them. wanted something simple since this is a pretty involved job and a light switch doesnt need to be one of complicated parts. ordered this particular style because dogs can turn them off and on! life life is great you train your 4 legged buddies to control the lights and close doors........... until you forget to feed them. Material, size and quality of product are all as expected, they wired in easily and when i said let there be light - the dogs gave it a test drive and it was good.

reviews.title: simple light switches

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: I got these for my hallway that are a 2way light switches. This kit allows me to continue to use my lights how they are, but update the look to a more modern style, and we don't even use these switches since they are controlled by a smart device. Installing was simple, and did not take long to complete. Was able to attached the cover, and the change is better compared to how they previously looked.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2024
reviews.title: Simple change to modernize your switch. Looks amazing

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: This is the first time I've seen a grounding screw wire that you can just easily clamp down instead of making the hook end. These four-way switches have a metal back plane. They are the standard common white color. Typical click noise when switching. They come with screw on single gang cover plates. They can be wired with either push in or side wiring.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2024
reviews.title: Easy grounding screw attachment

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: This is a two pack of light switches as well as the accompanying wall plates. I switched out our old light switches because they were very old and showing signs of wear and tare. This was a simple job, pull wires off the old switch and place them in the exact same spot on the new switches. It literally took me less than ten minutes to replace each light switch. It helped that these were the exact same color as well. The difference now is that the old ones had dirt and grime as well as being loose when turning the switch on and off. The new switch very audibly "clicks" and is very is also very crisp in its action of pushing the switch on and off. These seem decent for the price they're asking. I woke recommend.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2024
reviews.title: Pack of 2 light switches and wall plates

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: This are decent quality 4 way switch and comes in 2 pack at very good price. The material and quality is very good and works great also. Comes with cover plate and is good switches. You have to use this 2 of 3 way switch.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2024
reviews.title: Excellent quality 4 way switch with very good price

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: I rewired the lighting in my basement and needed four switch locations. I used 2 of these switches.They worked perfectly. Another reviewer complained about a 'wiring diagram. If you need a wiring diagram perhaps you shouldn't be installing line voltage switches. A simple continuity or ohmmeter will tell you everything you need to for wiring them. The switches themselves are UL listed. They feel like any other 4-way I have used. The wiring screws tightened down well and held. The price point is very good especially if you need cover plates.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2024
reviews.title: Good 4-way decora switch

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: These are good quality switches. Good value for the price. These are 4 way switches but we're just going to use them as replacement switches in a remodel. My husband the electrician says they great for controlling lights from 3 locations also. They have a good feel when you push them up or down. The switch plates are full size, covering the not perfect cutout for the switch.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2024
reviews.title: Good value, nice quality

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: IN the middle of a major home remodel and the electrician suggested a "4-way switch" which actually allows us to control a bank of lights from three locations. Found this on Amazon and he gave the thumbs up. They are going to be installed next week with the majority of the new switches and outlets, but he just looked at them and said they were great - just what he needed. I'll let him do the hard work with the wiring, etc. But I do like the look and feel of the cover plate and the rocker switch itself. As always, lean on the reviews before going in blindly. I am very pleased with this product.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.title: Read the reviews - make sure this is the right switch for you!

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: 4 Way switches aren't very common, and the ones in the big box stores are a lot more expensive. If you need only one, i would get one from a big box store since they are about $8, but if you need two and plates, this is a better deal. These are also UL listed and commercial grade so they should have no problem being approved in a project.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.title: Much better price than big box stores

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: "Four way" switches are used when you have three or more switches controlling one load. These oddly named units from China look and feel much like the lower cost tier ones you can find at local building supply stores. So far they are working fine, but in the future I honestly will stick to buying premium grade units from well-known brands. The labor of changing these things out is more consequential than the purchase cost, so take that into account in your decision.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.title: These seem like typical residential quality switches of this type

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: I quickly replaced my old ivory colored toggle style 4 way switches with these nice-looking decorator style switches. Wiring is simple, just pay attention to which terminals are marked in and out as they may have a different orientation to your existing switches. You can clamp your wire ends pushed in straight under the screw terminal, which I must believe is safer than the stab in kind, or you can secure them wrapped under the screw head in the traditional way. The switch has a nice positive click to it, and the cover plate is of good quality, though I prefer the kind with the hidden screws. Easily comparable to the big box store offerings.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.title: Good Quality

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: I got these switches for my home just installed one for my kitchen and it works as it should install was simple I just cut the power before for safety. I ended up using the frame from my old switch which is clip on because the ones it comes with would not work for me because of the quartz backsplash to thick screws would not reach.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.title: Works well

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: A 4-way switch means that you can turn on and off the light from 3 different locations (not 4). If you think about it, a normal one location switch is 2-way (on or off). This one installs and wires like any normal 4-way switch (they provide a wiring diagram on the box), but when you press it to switch it on or off it makes a loud clicking sound and the motion is gritty, like it's going through multiple contacts to reach the final stop. It is possible to leave it in a partially-on position, which is not good. I don't like how it feels and it doesn't give me confidence, but it does work. It is UL listed.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.title: Not a good feeling switch

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: These switches are the same quality as the big boys. They can be backwired. They have a strip gauge. They have a metal strap that run the entire back of the switch, etc... They are UL listed. I don't expect to have any problems with them.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.title: Same Quality as the Name Brands

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: Wiring 4 way switches is akin to doing advanced calculus!!! I have done numerouse 4 way switches in the past and every time the wiring paths are a mind bender. I am used to a 4 way being labeled as in and out as either the top two terminals are in and bottom out or one side is in and the other out. I didn't see these as being labeled but interestingly enough as I am looking at the pictures for this review, I now see on the back way at the bottom it say IN on one side and Out on the other. As for the switch. It is a good switch. Seems well made. It isn't a silent switch but not really loud either. Just a normal switch sound when you push it. Getting two for the price is a good deal. Comes with basic plates that work but nothing special.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.title: Wiring diagram isn't what I wa expecting

reviews.productTitle: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)
reviews.text: There's not too much to say about a switch, either it works or it doesn't. These 4-way switches work fine. The connections are solid. The rocker function "clicks" well when pressed. You can pay a lot for a 4-way switch. This two-pack represents a good value in 4-way switches.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.title: Nice 4-way Decorative Switches
